PHRASE.LANG: Kota was a great man. Surly, demanding, with the ability to whip even Starkiller into shape - obviously he deserves his own statue in your place of rest. [#Legal]
Kota était un grand homme. Hargneux, exigeant, avec la capacité de remettre Starkiller à sa place. Assurément, il mérite sa propre statue. [#Legal]
Kota war ein toller Mann. Sicherlich, er war streng und besaß die Fähigkeit, selbst Starkiller auf Zack zu bringen - jedenfalls gebührt ihm eine eigene Statue an deinem Ruheplatz. [#Legal]
Kota era un grande uomo. Scontroso, esigente, capace di mettere in riga anche Starkiller - naturalmente si merita una statua tutta sua nel tuo luogo di riposo. [#Legal]
Kota era un gran hombre. Hosco, exigente, con la capacidad de poner incluso a Starkiller en su lugar - obviamente se merece su propia estatua en tu lugar de descanso. [#Legal]
Kota was a great man. Surly, demanding, with the ability to whip even Starkiller into shape - obviously he deserves his own statue in your place of rest. [#Legal]
